name: Embassy Suites Laredo

reviews.title: Laredo's Best Accomodations
reviews.text: The Embassy Suites was very well kept. The staff was very helpful, the room was cleaned very thoroughly each of the 10 days I was there. Room service food was very tasty. I would definitely stay there again.

The staff was very accommodating especially with last minute request. Juan and Melinda where wonderful in assisting me with my requests, I truly caught them at there best. Rooms where really clean and beds confortable.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel and wonder staff

reviews.text: We have stayed at other places in Laredo but this Embassy Suites was by far the best. Very nice lobby, clean, quiet, and an exceptional complimentary breakfast. We felt safe and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. The mall is right next door within a 3 min. walk. I would rate this as a 4 star hotel.
reviews.title: Safe, Clean and upscale environment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Excellent! From the moment we arrived to the moment we left the staff and management treat us like family. We travel within the US and we only stay at Embassy Suites. We enjoy the breakfast and the happy hour. We have met other families and couples when we travel. The overall feeling is relaxing and inviting.
reviews.title: TripAdvisor

reviews.text: Nice clean hotel. The rooms are very clean and the beds and covers are always nice and fresh. I enjoy the great breakfast, made to order omelettes are a nice plus. The front desk staff is extremely courteous as well as the staff in the dining area. Free happy hour is also a nice perk, even if you are going down there to have a soft drink. Great hotel, great people!
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: This was to be a one-night stop on our way from our retirement home in Mexico to our daughter's home in San Antonio. That night, I became very ill and asked at the desk for directions to any all-night clinic that might be available. Bethany asked some questions and then urged us to go to the hospital emergency room. She asked the courtesy van driver to take us there. I was admitted to the hospital after several hours in the emergency room. That night, and during the next few days of my stay in the hospital, the staff at Embassy Suites showed extreme kindness and the driver took my wife back and forth to the hospital at least twice a day.
reviews.title: One Of the Best!

reviews.text: The manager of the hotel was very attentive to my wife. We appreciate all of the kindnesses. After I left the hospital, we were able to enjoy the amenities of the hotel before finally heading up to visit our daughter and grandchildren.
reviews.title: Tried & True

reviews.text: We dumped at highly reviewed hotel in Laredo because of our disappontment in the service and accomodations. I called Embassy Suites in Laredo and made a reservation for the next night and they had room, check in was 3 p.m.. We drove past it around 1:15 p.m. and stopped to see if we could check in early and YES! the room was clean and ready. Jessica at the front desk was helpful in every way and we were in our room by 1:30. The room was large and comfortable. It could be a little more soundproofed but didnt keep us awake or anything. We had breakfast the next morning and hit the road back to Houston rested and refreshed. I've stayed at a number of Embassy Suites in a number of places and never had a complaint and still don't.
reviews.title: Business Trip

reviews.text: Embassy Suites is a beautiful hotel with great customer service. I had not been there in about 5 years and it was amazing to see that it was still just as beautiful, clean and with great customer service.
reviews.title: Premium Value

reviews.text: You definitely get a bang for your buck here. The service is great all around. I especially looked forward to that breakfast buffet, yummm. Clean and spacious rooms, good looking interior. Go try it for yourself and see what I mean
reviews.title: First time at Embassy Suites in Laredo, TX

reviews.text: Good stay. Quiet, comfortable, roomy room. Nice clean pool and fitness center. Cant beat the free Happy Hour and breakfast. Have stayed at this hotel many times and it is one of the better Embassy Suites I have stayed at across the Country.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

reviews.text: I am very glad that the Embassy Suites is in Laredo. It was like an oasis. The hotel was more interesting for me to lounge in than the city of Laredo itself on a hot Texas summer day. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The two-room suite was clean and comfortable, great for a tired body to rest and sleep soundly. The complimentary made-to-order hot breakfast was excellent, offering both American and Mexican fairs. The manager's reception was OK with snacks and beverages. The common pool was smaller than I what I thought I saw online, and hot tub was cozy and hot. The sun deck was closed, probably due to high temperatures outside. The fitness center was more than adequate for my needs, containing two elliptical machines, two treadmills, and free weights. And business center had a computer with Internet access and printer for my requirement, in addition to the Wi-FI for a fee available throughout the hotel.
reviews.title: Mini-resort on a border town

reviews.text: Embassy Suites does not disappoint. It consistently has a great bed, clean room, and a gracious space in which to relax. This is THE place to stay in Laredo. The breakfast cannot be beat and Victor makes a great cocktail at the end of the day.
reviews.title: My Laredo Home

reviews.text: The entire staff at your hotel was professional and courteous. The complimentary breakfast is the best i've ever had at any hotel....period. This hotel is well suited for business and or personal stays. I will be staying here again from now on.
reviews.title: Laredo

reviews.text: Very thankful for the excellent service I received from everyone at the Embassy Suites in Laredo, Tx. I reserved 4 rooms for family and enjoyed an excellent formal dinner at the Steakhouse. The BEST filet minon I have ever had. Everyone praised the quality of the rooms, service, food, and hospitality.
reviews.title: Graduation Celebration
Relaxing respite from the rest of town
reviews.text: I have really grown to love Embassy Suites. And, after a pretty terrible experience in Laredo overall, I would have to say that this hotel was the highlight of my trip.
Comfortable bed. Quietish rooms.
reviews.title: weekend with gma

reviews.text: The rooms seemed more spartan than most -- as if some artwork and some furniture were missing.
reviews.title: Embassy Suites-Laredo

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would recommend NOT getting a room in the back (I believe a west facing room). These are over the air compressors and, when they are on, they are pretty loud. The light blocking curtains dampened some of the noise, but not all.
reviews.title: Return Visit

reviews.text: As noted elsewhere, breakfast was above average!
reviews.title: Business Stay

description: Centrally located only 3 miles from Laredo International Airport, the Embassy Suites Laredo hotel is a short drive from historic downtown Laredo and the Mexican border. Enjoy the comforts of home and excellent Embassy Suites service at our hotel in Laredo, TX. Get some work done in your suite with high-speed internet access and appreciate plenty of room for business or to spend time with the family. Our two-room suites are designed with a private bedroom and a separate seating area with a sofa bed. Use the wet bar kitchen with a microwave and refrigerator to make a favorite snack while watching a movie on one of two flat-screen TVs.
